questions.question: What is the predominant color of the air fryer's exterior?
What appears to be the primary material of the air fryer's body?
What is the general shape of the air fryer's cooking chamber?
Does the air fryer feature a visible control panel on its surface?
What kind of handle, if any, is noticeable on the air fryer's basket?
Is there an apparent removable or non-integrated cooking basket?
What is the texture of the air fryer's visible outer surface?
Can you see any noticeable brand markings or logos on the device?
Based on the image, what is the air fryer's approximate size relative to the food?
What type of button or knob is prominently featured on the air fryer?
Does the air fryer seem to have a visible digital display?
Is there evidence of a power cord connected to the air fryer?
What is the overall design style of the air fryer; modern or retro?
Judging from the image, is the air fryer's finish glossy or matte?
Is there a visible frying basket inside the air fryer's main chamber?
